channel.title: Item slot
channel.description: I am using a PI base and I have added customs, when I try to wear the custom weapons they go into the head item slot. I tried looking in item.java where you change the slots, there is no area to make it go to the weapons slot.

item.title: Item slot
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ReaperXScape, post:1, topic:543463”]I am using a PI base and I have added customs, when I try to wear the custom weapons they go into the head item slot.
I tried looking in item.java where you change the slots, there is no area to make it go to the weapons slot.[/quote]

That’s because by default they go into the weapon slot…

Chances are you have the item name (full or partial) in one of the methods for the head wearing, or you have the item id set go to the head in the equipItem method (or equivalent)

Read full topic
